name: Roza Palace
address: 255 Đường 1/4, Đảo Cát Bà, Việt Nam
description:
Roza Palace có hồ bơi ngoài trời, khu vườn, sân hiên và nhà hàng ở Đảo Cát Bà. Ngoài Wi-Fi miễn phí, khách sạn 3 sao này còn cung cấp dịch vụ phòng và bàn bán tour. Một số phòng tại chỗ nghỉ có ban công với view thành phố.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh. Tại Roza Palace, tất cả các phòng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Khách có thể thưởng thức bữa sáng thực đơn buffet, kiểu lục địa hoặc kiểu Anh/ Ai-len tại chỗ nghỉ.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Bãi biển Cat Co 1, Bãi biển Cát Cò 2 và Bãi biển Cat Co 3. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cát Bi, cách Roza Palace 54 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Kiến trúc độc lạ, cảm giác như mình đang ở trong núi vậy. Phòng sạch sẽ và yên tĩnh. Điều mình ấn tượng là view buổi chiều rất lí tưởng để nhâm nhi một ly cocktail và ngắm hoàng hôn với toàn cảnh vịnh của Trung tâm Cát Bà. Bạn Linh lễ tân rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình và quan tâm

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
review.comment_positive: Phòng nghỉ sạch sẽ. Free netflix 10 điểm.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Very helpful and welcoming staff who spoke good English and assisted on many occasions including Minh as our amazing translator at the hospital.
Location was perfect,  rooms were huge, beds comfy and very big. Interesting and beautiful  hotel, pool with a view. Felt very safe and well looked after here. Staff organised our transfers and a last minute extra night booking and a good  take away breakfast on a few occasions. Would highly recommend to everyone as our stay was amazing
review.comment_negative: Only a small issue, we had 3 rooms 1 had a toilet that had a bit of an aroma to it...

review.rating: Lovely clean hotel, large room, great patio
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Sân Trong
review.comment_positive: Lovely modern hotel, interesting features with natural rock

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: The location is great.  The hotel is very nice.  We had two rooms that connected.  The main room had a kitchenette and small sitting area.  They even have room service.  We were only there one night and it rained most of the time.  I wish it had been nicer so we could have enjoyed some of the facilities and the area.
review.comment_negative: Nothing negative to say about it.

review.rating: Lovely reasonably priced hotel in cat ba
review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người
review.comment_positive: The room was comfortable and staff were very helpful.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast was minimal but ok

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location of the hotel
review.comment_negative: Service can be improved. Atleast staff should be active in providing drinking water

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Great location, spacious clean rooms and amazing staff!

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The best looking hotel in the town, the most friendly and helpful staff we've met up to now (who speak fantastic English) who recommended and booked for us some really great activities in Cat Ba (one day cruise and motorbike rental). Would definitely recommend!
review.comment_negative: The English Breakfast XD definitely go for the omelette

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Sân Trong
review.comment_positive: Comfy & clean bedroom
review.comment_negative:
Overly westernised - I didn’t come to Vietnam for burgers or an English breakfast…
The pool is surrounded by dining chairs & tables.
The food was bland. We ordered from the ‘Vietnam food’ menu but didn’t have much taste.

review.comment_positive: Lovely modern hotel, interesting features with natural rock

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: The location is great.  The hotel is very nice.  We had two rooms that connected.  The main room had a kitchenette and small sitting area.  They even have room service.  We were only there one night and it rained most of the time.  I wish it had been nicer so we could have enjoyed some of the facilities and the area.
review.comment_negative: Nothing negative to say about it.

review.rating: Lovely reasonably priced hotel in cat ba
review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người
review.comment_positive: The room was comfortable and staff were very helpful.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast was minimal but ok

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location of the hotel
review.comment_negative: Service can be improved. Atleast staff should be active in providing drinking water

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Great location, spacious clean rooms and amazing staff!

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The best looking hotel in the town, the most friendly and helpful staff we've met up to now (who speak fantastic English) who recommended and booked for us some really great activities in Cat Ba (one day cruise and motorbike rental). Would definitely recommend!
review.comment_negative: The English Breakfast XD definitely go for the omelette

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Sân Trong
review.comment_positive: Comfy & clean bedroom
review.comment_negative:
Overly westernised - I didn’t come to Vietnam for burgers or an English breakfast…
The pool is surrounded by dining chairs & tables.
The food was bland. We ordered from the ‘Vietnam food’ menu but didn’t have much taste.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Kiến trúc độc lạ, cảm giác như mình đang ở trong núi vậy. Phòng sạch sẽ và yên tĩnh. Điều mình ấn tượng là view buổi chiều rất lí tưởng để nhâm nhi một ly cocktail và ngắm hoàng hôn với toàn cảnh vịnh của Trung tâm Cát Bà. Bạn Linh lễ tân rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình và quan tâm

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
review.comment_positive: Phòng nghỉ sạch sẽ. Free netflix 10 điểm.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Very helpful and welcoming staff who spoke good English and assisted on many occasions including Minh as our amazing translator at the hospital.
Location was perfect,  rooms were huge, beds comfy and very big. Interesting and beautiful  hotel, pool with a view. Felt very safe and well looked after here. Staff organised our transfers and a last minute extra night booking and a good  take away breakfast on a few occasions. Would highly recommend to everyone as our stay was amazing
review.comment_negative: Only a small issue, we had 3 rooms 1 had a toilet that had a bit of an aroma to it...

review.comment_negative: Only a small issue, we had 3 rooms 1 had a toilet that had a bit of an aroma to it...

review.rating: Lovely clean hotel, large room, great patio
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Sân Trong
review.comment_positive: Lovely modern hotel, interesting features with natural rock

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: The location is great.  The hotel is very nice.  We had two rooms that connected.  The main room had a kitchenette and small sitting area.  They even have room service.  We were only there one night and it rained most of the time.  I wish it had been nicer so we could have enjoyed some of the facilities and the area.
review.comment_negative: Nothing negative to say about it.

review.rating: Lovely reasonably priced hotel in cat ba
review.room_type: Phòng 3 Người
review.comment_positive: The room was comfortable and staff were very helpful.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast was minimal but ok

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Location of the hotel
review.comment_negative: Service can be improved. Atleast staff should be active in providing drinking water

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Great location, spacious clean rooms and amazing staff!

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The best looking hotel in the town, the most friendly and helpful staff we've met up to now (who speak fantastic English) who recommended and booked for us some really great activities in Cat Ba (one day cruise and motorbike rental). Would definitely recommend!
review.comment_negative: The English Breakfast XD definitely go for the omelette

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Sân Trong
review.comment_positive: Comfy & clean bedroom
review.comment_negative:
Overly westernised - I didn’t come to Vietnam for burgers or an English breakfast…
The pool is surrounded by dining chairs & tables.
The food was bland. We ordered from the ‘Vietnam food’ menu but didn’t have much taste.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Kiến trúc độc lạ, cảm giác như mình đang ở trong núi vậy. Phòng sạch sẽ và yên tĩnh. Điều mình ấn tượng là view buổi chiều rất lí tưởng để nhâm nhi một ly cocktail và ngắm hoàng hôn với toàn cảnh vịnh của Trung tâm Cát Bà. Bạn Linh lễ tân rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình và quan tâm

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
review.comment_positive: Phòng nghỉ sạch sẽ. Free netflix 10 điểm.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Very helpful and welcoming staff who spoke good English and assisted on many occasions including Minh as our amazing translator at the hospital.
Location was perfect,  rooms were huge, beds comfy and very big. Interesting and beautiful  hotel, pool with a view. Felt very safe and well looked after here. Staff organised our transfers and a last minute extra night booking and a good  take away breakfast on a few occasions. Would highly recommend to everyone as our stay was amazing
